title: Kate Ferdinand hikes in a crop top in Turkish wedding photo
text:
She is a fitness enthusiast and even hit the gym on the morning of her Turkish wedding.

And Kate Ferdinand continued to show off her enviably-toned physique as she shared throwback snaps from a hike in the mountains on Instagram on Monday.

The former TOWIE star, 28, looked incredible as she flaunted her washboard abs in a tiny black bandeau crop top and thigh-skimming shorts.

Wow factor: Kate Ferdinand continued to show off her enviably-toned physique as she shared throwback snaps from a hike in the mountains on Instagram on Monday

Kate flew her personal trainers Michael Evans and Mel Deane out to Turkey to ensure she was in the best shape for her wedding.

The bride was put through her paces as she ran up steps which wound round the mountain, and couldn't resist taking a photo for Instagram.

Donning a pair of black aviators, the reality star flashed a smile for the camera. She captioned the snaps: 'Missing the holiday hikes .... and the weather this mornings workout wasn’t quite the same Love to walk & hike... especially in the sun #fitterhappierhealthier'.

Working up a sweat: The former TOWIE star, 28, looked incredible as she flaunted her washboard abs in a tiny black bandeau crop top and thigh-skimming shorts

Hike: Kate flew her personal trainers Michael Evans and Mel Deane out to Turkey to ensure she was in the best shape for her wedding

Last week, Kate revealed to her followers that she hit the gym on the day of her wedding.

Sharing a series of videos of herself working out, she wrote: 'Lots of people asking did I train the morning of the wedding .... of course I bl**dy DID.

'it’s not just about the body it’s about the mind ... going into the best day of my life feeling focused and happy.' [sic]

Showing gratitude to her personal trainer Mel , she concluded: 'Thank you @meldeane12 for the wedding morning workout #itsalifestyle.'

Beauty: Kate is a fitness enthusiast and even hit the gym on the morning of her Turkish wedding

Kate looked radiant on the big day in a risqué corseted gown before showing off her abs in a crop top and maxi skirt for the wedding reception.

In one hilarious video, Rio is seen getting low - however he admitted he was struggling with the dance due to his age, as he penned: 'Should I really be doing this at my age?'

Dancing played quite the integral part of their big day, as the couple were rocking out to various types of music - including a saxophonist, a live band and eventually the R&B icon Ashanti.

Kate and Rio became engaged in November following a romantic proposal in Dubai, where he popped the question in front of his three children; Lorenz, 13, Tate, 11, who and daughter Tia, eight .
